Package model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Represents a card from the Risk deck.
    ExpertAIPlayer
    Computer player.
    HumanPlayer
    Allows a human user to play a game of Risk.
    IntermediateAIPlayer
    More intelligent than Simple AI Strategy: randomly places first in a territory, then add other troops in adjacent territories.
    Player
    Abstract class to represent players in the game of Risk.
    SimpleAIPlayer
    Simple AI that makes decisions based on a random generator.
    Territory
    The Territory class represents, intuitively, a territory in the game of Risk, complete with name, owner, armies, continent, color, and list of adjacent territories.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Card.CardType
    Enum for card types
    Continent
    Enum representing the continents on the map for a game of Risk
    ObserverMessages
    Enum for messages passed from the observable classes to the observer, that is, from Player and RiskController to RiskGUI.
